name: Atom Blaster (Slyno)
description:
Atom Blaster is an action packed game based on the classic 1988 Atari ST game, Atom Smasher. Bringing you 32 levels with classic designs and new special bricks to bring lots of challenging gameplay. Unlock the Blaster and crank your way through the hardened bricks, bombs, and speed boosters. Multi-launch your atoms for a fast and frenzy approach!

Features:

  • 32 Level Designs
  • 11 Brick Types
  • 3 Game Speeds.
  • Top 10 Leaderboard

Tips:

  • Extra atom every 1,500 points.
  • Hold B for a speed boost.
  • Multi-launch your atoms to clear levels fast.
  • All unlocked atoms remain yours into the next level.
  • Use your Blaster to get those hard to hit bricks.
  • Use those angles to get your atom into hard to reach places.
  • Use the game over codes to warp back any time.
